name: merge-reports

schema.title: Schema for Playwright Merge Reports Executor
schema.description: THIS IS AN INTERNAL EXECUTOR USED BY ATOMIZED TASKS. DO NOT USE IT DIRECTLY. Merge Playwright blob reports and aggregate the results.

blobReportsDir.description: Directory containing the Playwright blob reports. Relative to the project root.

config.description: The Playwright configuration file path. Relative to the project root.

expectedSuites.description: The expected number of test suites to produce a report.
